ygData.subject: Re: NBW
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine smiled, he was realizing just what he meant to her, and while his spark wanted to feal the same his logic circuits told him otherwise. They were two

Lunarpine smiled, he was realizing just what he meant to her, and while his
spark wanted to feal the same his logic circuits told him otherwise. They
were two different species in both modes.

He is a wolf she is an owl, those two animals didn't mix. he is a warrior
ans she's a thinker, he knew that if he persued this then she'd end up hurt.

Lunarpine smelled the air, a scent he hadn't had the pleasure of smelling
for a while. Striker was back. Lunarpine followed the scent intending to
locate his fellow wolf.


----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 06, 2000 6:06 PM
Subject: Re: NBW


> ::Shadow Wing::
>
> She smiled at him and nodded. "Ok", she said with a chuckle, "I'll
> let that do." She kissed Luinarpine on the cheek and laughed. "You
> sly wolf you." She smiled and walked to entrance.  She wanted to make
> sure nothing else was going to explode.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "You want the truth, (you can't handle the just kidding) OK, I
> fealt
> > cooped up in here so I did some adventuring and raninto a problem
> > with a little kitty, I'm alive, it's dead, problem solved, I win."
> > HThe wolfbot hoped that would be enough for Shadow wings curiosity.
> >
> > "And while I'm telling the truth, I'm glad you were the one who
> came
> > out to meet me, thank you." He was sincere about his words, now he
> > hoped she'd be happy with his honesty.
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > Shadow Wing::
> > >
> > > "Oh I don't know, maybe the truth would be nice?"
> > >
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > The CR chamber opened to let Lunarpine out, his internal
> repairs
> > > > could handle the rest. the only thing that it couldn't repair
> was
> > > his
> > > > pride.
> > > >
> > > > He walked down the hall after Shadow Wing. "Wing wait" he
> called
> > > > after her, "what is it you want from me?" He already knew the
> > > answer,
> > > > he'd only hoped he was wrong.
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > > > ::Shadow Wing::
> > > > >
> > > > > She took one look at him. She smiled warmly at him.  She put
> > her
> > > > had
> > > > > on his shoulder. She looked into his eyes.
> > > > > "PRED POOP!"
> > > > > She turned on her heels and walked down the hall.
> > > > > "When you want to tell me what really happened, let me know."
> > > > > She walked away and towards the entrance to the ship.
> > > > >
> > > > > She knew he had to have run into trouble out there.  She also
> > > knew
> > > > > that if he told her what realy happened, his pride would be
> > > bruised.
> > > > > But she wanted him to tell her the truth.  If she had to
> speak
> > > > > truthfully to him, he would have to be so to her.  She
> > > > smiled, "yup,
> > > > > I have to so he has to as well."
> > > > >
> > > > > She wasn't mad at him, but it did hurt that he felt that he
> > > > couldn't
> > > > > tell her what happened out right.  Maybe he was trying to
> > protect
> > > > his
> > > > > pride? Maybe he lost the fight and didn't want to tell her?
> Who
> > > > > knows. But it did hurt that he couldn't just tell her
> outright.
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > > > "I'll be alright Wing, anone hurt by the blast?" he'd do or
> > say

> tried
> > to
> > > > > > change her mood, that didn't work either

> entire
> > > > > platoon
> > > > > > of Preds, it was only four or five. I would'v stayed to
> > finish
> > > > them
> > > > > > but I figured they won't mess with me again. That is once
> > > they're
> > > > > out
> > > > > > of Stasis lock." He still didn't want to admit his
> stupidity
> > to
> > > > her.

> with

> > > > > over
> > > > > > > look of him to make sure he was all healed.  "Glowing
> sight
> > > > huh?
> > > > > > me?

> > > > > > of
> > > > > > > preds.  What happened?"

> > > > > > > was about to fly the globe looking for you. THank the

> > > > your
> > > > > > > alright. But what happened?"
